mapper.select: SELECT c.course_id AS courseId, c.category_id AS categoryId, c.user_id AS userId, c.title AS title, c.description AS description, c.price AS price, c.thumbnail_url AS thumbnailUrl, c.detail_img_url AS detailImgUrl, c.open_type AS openType, c.status AS status, c.delete_flg AS deleteFlg, c.created_at AS createdAt, c.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM course c WHERE c.course_id = #{courseId} AND c.delete_flg = 0

SELECT ch.chapter_id AS chapterId, ch.course_id AS courseId, ch.title AS title, ch.order_index AS orderIndex, ch.section_title AS sectionTitle FROM chapter ch WHERE ch.course_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY ch.order_index ASC

SELECT CASE WHEN c.open_type = 'ALWAYS' THEN '무제한' WHEN c.open_type = 'PERIOD' THEN CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(c.open_start, '%Y-%m-%d'), ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(c.open_end, '%Y-%m-%d') ) ELSE '무제한' END AS periodText FROM course c WHERE c.course_id = #{courseId}

SELECT u.name AS name, r.rating, r.content AS comment FROM review r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.course_id = #{courseId} AND r.delete_flg = 0 AND (r.comment_status = 'Approved' OR r.comment_status IS NULL) ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
